short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist, ZEN-style time visualization for your new tab to let you stay focused

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Timely Tabs
Rediscover the value of time with Timely Tabs, a sleek and minimalistic new tab extension that keeps you mindful of the moments that have passed.

⏳ Features:
Displays the total time elapsed today,this week ,this month and this year in a clean and modern layout.
Encourages awareness and focus by reminding you of the day’s progress.
Designed with simplicity and productivity in mind, free from distractions.
Make every second count with Timely Tabs—a subtle yet powerful reminder to stay present and make the most of your time.
